articles.description: Over the last two days, Splatoon 3 players have participated in a Splatfest centered around different ice cream flavors. Nintendo Switch users were tasked with choosing between Vanilla, Strawberry, and Mint Chip. The results are now in, and it seems that Team…

articles.title: Teen hacked Uber, Revolut and Grand Theft Auto maker, London court hears - Reuters
